models.name: AdCampaign
models.description: An Advertising Campaign

fields.name: account_id
fields.description: If the "interface" field is set to "affiliate", this will contain the ID of the Affiliate who owns this campaign.  If the "interface" field is set to "network" this will be NULL.  Affiliates can only modify creatives they own.

fields.name: custom_weights
fields.description: Whether or not to use the custom weights feature to determine how often each creative for this campaign is served. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/23312738-Custom-weights-the-ad-manager-campaign

fields.name: height
fields.description: Only required for campaigns with the "type" field set to "banner".  Specifies height used to display the ad tag.  Cannot change once creatives have been assigned to this campaign.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated ID for the campaign.

fields.name: interface
fields.description: Indicates whether this campaign was created by the network (making it read-only) or by the affiliate.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The most recent time this campaign was modified.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the campaign

fields.name: optimization
fields.description: Whether or not to display creatives in the campaign based on their performance.

fields.name: optimization_field
fields.description: Which metric to use when optimizing creatives contained in the campaign. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/24246593-Auto-optimization-in-the-Ad-Manager-

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the campaign

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type creatives used in this campaign. Campaigns of type "text" can only contain text creatives, but can be displayed using a javascript ad tag with no specific height and width.  Campaigns of type "banner" are limited to a specific height and width, but can contain images, flash banners, and third party ad tags.  The type change once creatives have been added to this campaign.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Only required for campaigns with type set to "banner".  Specifies width used to display the ad tag.  Cannot change once creatives have been assigned to this campaign.

models.name: AdCampaignCreative
models.description: An Advertising Campaign Creative.

fields.name: ad_campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the Ad Campaign to which the creative belongs.

fields.name: custom_weight
fields.description: The percent (relative to other creatives in the campaign) that this one should be served.  Applicable only if the Ad Campaign has "custom_weights" enabled.  If the sum total of the custom weights on creatives for an Ad Campaign are over 100%, the creatives without a custom weight will not be displayed.  If the sum total is below 100%, the creatives with a custom weight will only display the given percentage; any unallocated percentage will use the given optimization setting for the campaign.  If a creative cannot be found for the given optimization, a random creative will be displayed (Geo Targeting applied).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated ID for the creative.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The most recent time this creative was modified.

fields.name: offer_file_id
fields.description: The Offer File ID.  Required if the associated Ad Campaign "type" is set to "text" or "banner"; must be NULL otherwise.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The Offer ID.  Required if the associated Ad Campaign "type" is set to "link"; must be NULL otherwise.

fields.name: offer_url_id
fields.description: The ID of the Offer Url.  If not provided, defaults to "0" and the default Offer URL will be used.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the creative

fields.name: weight
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the value in this field.

models.name: Advertiser
models.description: An company that advertises one or more Offers through the Network.

fields.name: company
fields.description: The company name of the Advertiser.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for the Advertiser.

models.name: Affiliate
models.description: An Affiliate account registered with the Network.  This identifies the company details of the Affiliate.  An Affiliate can have multiple Affiliate Users each with their own login, associated with this Affiliate account.  In order to update the Affiliate account, the user must have Account Management permission.

fields.name: account_manager_id
fields.description: The ID of the Employee from the Network who is assigned as the account manager for the Affiliate.

fields.name: address1
fields.description: The first line of the account's physical address.

fields.name: address2
fields.description: The second line of the account's physical address.

fields.name: affiliate_tier_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate Tier to which this Affiliate is assigned.  If no value is present, the Affiliate is in the default tier.

fields.name: city
fields.description: The city of the account's physical address.

fields.name: company
fields.description: The company name of the Affiliate.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of the account's physical address.  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

fields.name: date_added
fields.description: The date this account was created.

fields.name: fax
fields.description: The fax number of the Affiliate.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated identifier for the Affiliate.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The last time this account was updated.

fields.name: method_data
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: other
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: payment_method
fields.description: The method by which payments are made to the Affiliate.  The network may restrict which methods are allowed.

fields.name: payment_terms
fields.description: The schedule by which invoices are generated for this Affiliate.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The Affiliate's phone number.

fields.name: ref_id
fields.description: An external reference ID for this account. For more information, see: http://www.hasoffers.com/wiki/Support_Questions:What_is_a_Reference_ID.

fields.name: region
fields.description: The state/province of the account's physical address.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the account.  Only active accounts can be logged into.

fields.name: w9_filed
fields.description: Whether or not a W9 / W8-BEN is on file for this account.

fields.name: wants_alerts
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: website
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: zipcode
fields.description: The zipcode / postal code of the account's physical address.

models.name: AffiliateAccountBalance
models.description: The account balance for an Affiliate.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate account the balance is for.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: The balance due for the Affiliate account.  This is the sum of all amounts for all unpaid Invoices.

models.name: AffiliateInvoice
models.description: An Invoice generated by the Network for an Affiliate.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate account the invoice belongs to.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the invoice (this is the sum of amounts for all this invoice's unpaid items).

fields.name: conversions
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The 3-character currency code identifying the currency used for this invoice.

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: The time the invoice was created.

fields.name: end_date
fields.description: The end of the date range this invoice is for.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated ID for this invoice.

fields.name: is_paid
fields.description: Whether or not the invoice has been paid out.

fields.name: memo
fields.description: Memo the Network attaches to the invoice.  May be an empty string if no memo was provided.

fields.name: receipt_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate Receipt that was used to pay the invoice.  Present if the invoice has been paid out.

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: The start of the date range this invoice is for.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the invoice.  Affiliates can only view active invoices.

models.name: AffiliateInvoiceItem
models.description: A single line item from an Affiliate Invoice.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: The contents of this field are applicable only if "type" is "stats".  Count of the number of clicks, conversions, or impressions, for the date covered by the Invoice start and end dates.  The type of event contained in this column depends on the "payout_type".  For "cpc" payout type this is number of clicks.  For "cpm" this is number of impressions.  For other payout types this is number of conversions.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Amount owed for the offer based on invoice start and end dates.

fields.name: conversions
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  The "actions" field should be consulted instead, to determine the number of clicks/conversions/impressions (if "type" is "stats").

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: Date that the invoice item was created.

fields.name: goal_id
fields.description: This field is present only if the network has Offer Goals enabled.  It specifies the Goal this invoice item is attributed, or NULL if the item is not attributed to a Goal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this Item.

fields.name: invoice_id
fields.description: The ID of the Invoice to which this item belongs.

fields.name: memo
fields.description: Memo added to the item by the Network.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The ID of the Offer to which this item is attributed.  Present when the "type" is "stats".

fields.name: offer_name
fields.description: The name of the Offer this item relates to (see: "offer_id")

fields.name: offer_is_visible
fields.description: Whether or not the Affiliate currently has access to view the referenced Offer.  This may not be true if the Offer has since expired or been deleted.

fields.name: payout_type
fields.description: The payout type of the Offer (or the Goal if present) if the "type" is "stats", or the adjustment type if the "type" is "adjustment".  For types other than "stats" set to "amount".

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of invoice item.  "stats" indicates this is for clicks/conversions/impressions (depending on "payout_type").  "adjustment" is for an adjustment, "referrals" are for referrals, and "vat" is for VAT/tax items.

fields.name: vat_code
fields.description: The VAT code identified by the Network.  Only applicable if "type" is "vat".

fields.name: vat_id
fields.description: An arbitrary, unique ID generated to identify this VAT rate in the Network.  Only applicable if "type" is "vat".

fields.name: vat_name
fields.description: A Network-defined name for this VAT rate.  Only applicable if "type" is "vat".

fields.name: vat_rate
fields.description: The Network-specified VAT rate being used to calculate tax, as a percentage (e.g. 15.00).  Only applicable if "type" is "vat".

models.name: AffiliateMeta
models.description: This contains information about the Affiliate account as well as the payment details that have been specified.  The payment details listed on this model are shared with each of the PaymentMethod models so they are not documented here.  Updates to payment details should be performed on the PaymentMethod models directly.  Only Affiliates with the Account Management permission can update this model.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate whose payment details are specified.

fields.name: ssn_tax
fields.description: The VAT / Tax ID for the Affiliate.  This field is present only if the Network has VAT taxing enabled.

models.name: AffiliateOffer
models.description: Represents the current relationship between an Affiliate and an Offer.  For Offers that require terms and conditions acceptance (Offer field "require_terms_and_conditions" field set to "enabled"), the "agreed_terms_and_conditions" field will record the date the Affiliate accepted the terms and conditions.  For Offers that require approval (Offer field "require_approval" is set to true), the "approval_status" field will contain the status of the application.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The Affiliate ID whose Offer relationship is described.

fields.name: agreed_terms_and_conditions
fields.description: The date on which the Affiliate agreed to the terms and conditions.  NULL if the Affiliate has not agreed to the terms and conditions or the Offer does not require acceptance of terms and conditions.

fields.name: approval_status
fields.description: For offers that require approval, this holds the status of the Affiliate's application to run the Offer.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for this AffiliateOffer.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The Offer ID to which this Affiliate relationship refers.

models.name: AffiliateReceipt
models.description: A receipt of payment made to an Affiliate.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate to whom this receipt records payment.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount paid.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The 3-character currency code identifying the currency used for this payment.

fields.name: date
fields.description: The date of the payment.

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: The date this receipt was created (not necessarily the date of payment).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this Receipt.

fields.name: memo
fields.description: A memo added for this payment by the Network.

fields.name: method
fields.description: The method used to make the payment.

fields.name: payment_details
fields.description: A serialized form of the Affiliate's payment method details that were used to make this payment.

fields.name: payment_info
fields.description: Same as the "payment_details" field but in unserialized (object) form.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of this payment.  Affiliates can only view Receipts for successfully completed payments.

fields.name: token
fields.description: A payment reference field without any predefined meaning.  Network may utilize this field.  Empty string if no value is present.

fields.name: transaction_id
fields.description: A payment reference field without any predefined meaning.  Network may utilize this field.  Empty string if no value is present.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  This field should be ignored.

models.name: AffiliateReferralCommission
models.description: Describes a custom Affiliate Referral commission setting for an Affiliate.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate whose referral commission rate this describes.

fields.name: field
fields.description: Field used from stats to base commission calculations.  Only applicable if "rate_type" is set to "percentage".

fields.name: rate
fields.description: The rate being paid.  When "rate_type" is "percentage" this is the percentage as a whole number, e.g. 5.25% would be stored as 5.25.  When "rate_type" is flat, this is the amount in currency that is paid per referral, e.g. $3.25 would be stored as 3.25.

fields.name: rate_type
fields.description: Method to compute commission using the "field" value.  If "flat", then a flat rate is paid for each referred account.  If "percentage" then referrals are paid based on the "rate" property, using the metric identified by the "field" property.  Example 1 -- ("rate_type" is "flat" and "rate" is 5.00: 10 referral accounts x $5 per referral = $50 commission).  Example 2 -- ("rate_type" is "percentage", commission "field" is "payout", "rate" is 5.00: $100 in payout x 5% = $5 commission)

models.name: AffiliateUser
models.description: A user account belonging to an Affiliate.  Affiliate users can update their own details (except permissions).  Other users in the Affiliate with the "Affiliate.user_management" can update user accounts.

fields.name: access
fields.description: An array of permissions for the Affiliate.  This array contains a value "Affiliate" that grants base Affiliate permissions.  Other possible permissions are: "Affiliate.stats" (Ability to view stats, graphs and reports), "Affiliate.offer_management" (Ability to manage offers), "Affiliate.user_management" (Ability to manage account users), "Affiliate.account_management" (Ability to manage the Affiliate account details), and "Affiliate.API" (Ability to request and use an Affiliate API V3 key).

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate in which this user account exists.

fields.name: cell_phone
fields.description: The user's cell phone number.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The user's email address.  Used as login.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The user's first name.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated ID for this user.

fields.name: join_date
fields.description: The date this user signed up.

fields.name: last_login
fields.description: The last time this user logged in (NULL if the user never logged in).

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The user's last name.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The last time this user was modified.  Note that in addition to updates to the user account, this is changed each time the user logs in.

fields.name: password
fields.description: The user's password (provided on create).

fields.name: password_confirmation
fields.description: Provided on creation and must match the provided "password" field.

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  This is an alternative (machine-friendly) form for displaying user permissions.  The "access" field should be consulted instead.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The user's phone number.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the user account.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The user's title.

fields.name: wants_alerts
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  This field should be ignored.

models.name: AffiliateUserAlert
models.description: This model associates an Alert with an Affiliate User, making it visible to that user.

fields.name: affiliate_user_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate User the Alert is for.

fields.name: alert_id
fields.description: The ID of the Alert for the Affiliate User.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique, auto-generated ID for this AffiliateUserAlert.

fields.name: is_dismissed
fields.description: Whether or not the Affiliate User has dismissed the referenced Alert.

models.name: Alert
models.description: An Alert containing a message from the Network for an Affiliate User.

fields.name: content
fields.description: An extended message.  For custom alerts ("type_code" of "100"), this may be present and contain extended/detailed information.  Not applicable for the "type_code" "601" or "602".

fields.name: data
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  This field contains serialized data that is used to populate the "description", such as the ID of the Offer the alert relates to.  It can be ignored.

fields.name: date
fields.description: The date the Alert was created.

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: The date the Alert was created.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief message/overview.  May be supplemented or replaced by additional details in the "content" field.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique ID for the Alert.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the Alert.  Affiliates can only view active Alerts.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the Alert.

fields.name: type_code
fields.description: A number identifying the type of Alert.  "100" is a custom Alert that could contain any message.  "601" is an Alert notifying that an Offer Application has been approved.  "602" is an Alert notifying that an Offer Application has been denied.

models.name: BrandInformation
models.description: Provides details about the Brand / Network.

fields.name: company_address1
fields.description: The first line of the Network's address.

fields.name: company_address2
fields.description: The second line of the Network's address.  May be an empty string.

fields.name: company_city
fields.description: The city the Network is located in.

fields.name: company_country
fields.description: The country the Network is located in.

fields.name: company_name
fields.description: The name of the Network.

fields.name: company_phone
fields.description: The phone number of the Network.

fields.name: company_region
fields.description: The state / province / region this Network is located in.

fields.name: company_zipcode
fields.description: The zipcode / postal code for this Network's address.

models.name: PayoutGroup
models.description: A Payout Group (AKA Cashflow Group) consists of a set of Rules which specify conditions that must pass in order for an event such as a conversion to receive a specific payout. For instance, a Payout Group may have a Rule that requires the conversion to be for specific countries, or from specific browsers. For more information, see http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/49757686-NEW-Payout-Revenue-Groups

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique ID for the Payout Group.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The unique name of the Payout Group.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of the Payout Group, typically giving an overview of its Rules.

fields.name: rules
fields.description: An array of Payout Group Rules that define conditions that must be met in order to receive a certain payout.  Rules consist of a field (e.g. country or aff_sub1), operator (e.g. STARTS_WITH), value (e.g. "Foo"), and optional negation (true/false).  In order for a Rule to be satisfied, the event must match on each field + operator + value combination defined in the rules.  For example, a rule with "field" set to "country", operator of "IN", and value of [US, CA], would only be satisfied if the conversion originated from the United States or Canada.

models.name: Country
models.description: A Country

fields.name: code
fields.description: The 2 or 3-character country code

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for the country

fields.name: is_active
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  This field should be ignored.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The country name.

fields.name: regions
fields.description: A list of regions in the country. This field may not always be present for all API calls.

models.name: Employee
models.description: An Employee of the network.  Some networks assign Employees as affiliate managers.

fields.name: aim
fields.description: The Employee's chat alias.

fields.name: cell_phone
fields.description: The Employee's cell phone number.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The Employee's email address.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The Employee's first name.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for the Employee.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The Employee's last name.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The Employee's phone number.

fields.name: photo
fields.description: The URL location of the Employee's photograph.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The Employee's title.

models.name: Goal
models.description: Goals are used to track multiple conversion points for a single Offer. Goals may be disabled for some Networks. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/20717593-Offer-Goals.

fields.name: default_payout
fields.description: The flat rate/amount paid for this Goal.  The value in this field is applicable only if "payout_type" is set to "cpa_flat" or "cpa_both".

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of this Goal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this Goal

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the Goal.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The ID of the Offer to which this Goal applies.

fields.name: payout_type
fields.description: Specifies the method of calculating payout for this Goal.  "cpa_flat" indicates a flat amount will be paid, specified in the "default_payout" field.  "cpa_percentage" indicates that a percentage of the sale will be paid, specified in the "percent_payout" field.  "cpa_both" indicates that both a flat rate and a percentage of the sale will be paid.

fields.name: percent_payout
fields.description: The percent of sale paid for this Goal.  For example, a value of "25.00" would indicate a 25% payout.  The value in this field is applicable only if "payout_type" is set to "cpa_percentage" or "cpa_both".

models.name: Hostname
models.description: Describes an available tracking domain for the Network.

fields.name: domain
fields.description: The domain name, e.g. "tracking.example.com".

fields.name: has_ssl
fields.description: Whether or not SSL is used.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for this hostname.

fields.name: type
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  The value of this field should be ignored.

models.name: OfferCategory
models.description: A category to which one or more Offers can be assigned.  Used to group Offers together based on some common theme.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID of the Category.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name assigned to the Category.

models.name: OfferFile
models.description: A file/creative associated with an Offer. Only Affiliates with the Offer Management permission can create Offer Files. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/20712007-Creative-Files.

fields.name: account_id
fields.description: The Affiliate ID for Offer Files having an "interface" of "affiliate"; Advertiser ID for if "interface" is "advertiser"; NULL for Network-owned Offer Files.

fields.name: code
fields.description: HTML code.  Required for Offer Files with the types: "email creative", "text ad", and "html ad".

fields.name: created
fields.description: The date the Offer File was created.

fields.name: display
fields.description: The display name for this file.
fields.runtimeDefault: Takes the name of the uploaded file if not set on create.

fields.name: filename
fields.description: The name of the file that was uploaded, optionally passed in.  Applicable to Offer Files with the types: "file", "image banner", "flash banner", "offer thumbnail", "hidden".  Will be an empty string for types not accompanied by a file.  Only the following file extensions are supported: "jpg", "jpeg", "gif", "png", "swf", "zip", "txt", "doc", "docx", "pdf", "rtf".

fields.name: flash_vars
fields.description: Applicable only for Offer Files with "type" of "flash banner".

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height in pixels.  Required for Offer Files with the types: "image banner", "flash banner", "offer thumbnail", and "html ad".
fields.runtimeDefault: Determined automatically for most image files, but if "type" is "flash banner" it must be explicitly provided.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this Offer File.

fields.name: interface
fields.description: Identifies the owner of this Offer File.  The Network, Advertisers, and the Affiliate can all create Offer Files.  Affiliates can only modify their own Offer Files.

fields.name: is_private
fields.description: DEPRECATED.  Ignore the contents of this field.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The last date the Offer File was updated.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The ID of the Offer to which this Offer File is associated.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size (in KB) of the file.  This is determined automatically at the time the file is uploaded.  For types not accompanied by a physical file this will be "0".

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the Offer File.

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: The URL of a thumbnail image.  Thumbnails are auto-generated on upload for most Offer Files of type "image banner" or where the uploaded file is one of: "gif", "jpg", "jpeg", "png".

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of Offer File. Affiliates are limited to creating Offer Files of the following types: "flash banner", "hidden", "html ad", "image banner", "text ad". For more information on each type, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/20712007-Creative-Files.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL for the uploaded file (if applicable).

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width in pixels.  Required for offer files with the types "image banner", "flash banner", "offer thumbnail", and "html ad".
fields.runtimeDefault: Determined automatically for most image files, but if "type" is "flash banner" it must be explicitly provided.

models.name: OfferPixel
models.description: Offer conversion pixel for tracking conversions in third-party systems.  Offer Pixels are an optional feature that some Networks do not support.  Only affiliates with the Offer Management permission can create/update Offer Pixels.  The only modification allowed after creation of an Offer Pixel is setting its "status" to "deleted"; changes to the "code" require a new Offer Pixel be created as it cannot be updated in place.

fields.name: affiliate_id
fields.description: The ID of the Affiliate to whom this Offer Pixel belongs

fields.name: code
fields.description: Valid URL if type parameter is set to "url", otherwise HTML code. Some variables can be used, which will be dynamically replaced. For more information, see: http://www.hasoffers.com/wiki/Application_Support:Conversion_Pixels_URLs.

fields.name: goal_id
fields.description: The Goal this Pixel is for.  If NULL, the Pixel is for the Offer referenced in the "offer_id" field.  This field will only be present for Networks that have the Goals feature enabled.

fields.name: id

fields.description: The type of Saved Report.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The Affiliate User ID to whom the Saved Report belongs.

models.name: ScheduledOfferChange
models.description: Describes changes scheduled to take effect for an Offer at some point in the future, affecting some aspect of the Offer, Goal, or associated payout.

fields.name: created_utc
fields.description: The date this scheduled change was created (UTC).

fields.name: goal_id
fields.description: This field will only be present if the Network has the "enable_offer_goals" Preference enabled.  If set it indicates the change is being applied to the Goal or one of its payouts.  If absent or NULL, it indicates that the change is being made to the Offer or one of its payouts instead.

fields.name: modified_utc
fields.description: If modifications are made to this schedule, this will be the date the schedule was altered (UTC).  A date of "0000-00-00 00:00:00" will be found if no alterations to the original schedule have been made.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The ID of the affected Offer.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of this change.  Only active/future changes that have not been applied yet are visible to Affiliates.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of change.  If "payout", indicates a change to the payout for this Offer or Goal will be made.  If "status", indicates a change to the status of this Offer or Goal will be made.

fields.name: update_field
fields.description: The field being modified by this change.  If "type" is status, this should be "status" as well and indicates that the specified Offer or Goal status will be modified.  If "type" is "payout" then this will be one of the following:  ("default_payout", "percent_payout", "rate", "percent").  If the value is "default_payout" or "rate" it indicates a change to the flat dollar amount payout.  If the value is "percent_payout" or "percent" it indicates a change to the percentage-based payout.

fields.name: update_time_utc
fields.description: This is the date at which this scheduled change will take effect (UTC).

fields.name: update_value
fields.description: This is the new value that will be applied to the Offer, Goal, or payout field identified by the "update_field" property.

models.name: SignupQuestion
models.description: A question that an Affiliate must answer on signup to the Network, or when applying for access to an Offer that requires approval, depending on its "type".

fields.name: class
fields.description: Indicates the type of input expected in response to this question.  If "bool" then the question expects an affirmative/negative response.  If "select" then the value should be selected from a list (specified in the "class_data" field).  If "textarea" then a free-form text answer is required.

fields.name: class_data
fields.description: Only applicable/present when the "class" property is set to "select".  Contains a list of allowed answers to this question, separated by line breaks.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for the question.

fields.name: question
fields.description: The text of the question being asked.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Whether or not an answer must be provided to this question.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this question is currently being asked.  Only active questions are visible to Affiliates.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Indicates what type of question this is.  If the value is "affiliate" then this is a question asked to Affiliates on signup.  If the value is "offer" then it is a question asked when an Affiliate applies for access to an Offer.

fields.name: type_id
fields.description: Only present when the "type" of the question is "offer" if it is a question specific to a single Offer.  If "type" is "offer" but this field is NULL then it indicates that this is a global question asked for all Offers that require approval.

models.name: Offer
models.description: An Offer.

fields.name: allow_direct_links
fields.description: If enabled, Affiliates are allowed to link directly to the Offer website without using a tracking link. Instead the Affiliate ID is included in the direct link and Javascript code will track the click when user lands on the page. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/21691503-Direct-Links

fields.name: allow_website_links
fields.description: If enabled, Affiliates are allowed to pull links from the Offer website and redirect their tracking links to specific pages. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/hc/en-us/articles/202266853-Affiliate-Tracking-Links#website-links

fields.name: conversion_cap
fields.description: Maximum number of conversions allowed per day for this Offer.  If value is set to "0" then there is no cap.  NOTE: Some Networks may choose to use this feature but this field is not present by default.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The 3-character currency symbol for this Offer.  Some Networks allow for individual Offers to use different currencies.  If NULL, this Offer uses the default Network currency.

fields.name: default_goal_name
fields.description: If the Offer has Goals enabled (indicated by the "has_goals_enabled" field), this is the name of the default Goal.  NOTE: This field will only be present if the Network has Offer Goals enabled.

fields.name: default_payout
fields.description: The flat rate/amount paid for this Offer.  Applicable only for Offers whose "payout_type" includes a flat rate component, i.e. "cpa_flat", "cpa_both", "cpc", and "cpm".

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of the Offer.

fields.name: dne_download_url
fields.description: If a DNE (Do Not Email) List is associated with this Offer, this will contain the URL to download the list.

fields.name: dne_list_id
fields.description: The ID of the DNE (Do Not Email) List associated with this Offer, if one exists.  Present when the Offer has DNE Lists enabled, indicated by the "show_mail_list" field

fields.name: dne_unsubscribe_url
fields.description: If a DNE (Do Not Email) List is associated with this Offer, this field will contain a URL where email addresses can be added to the DNE List.

fields.name: email_instructions
fields.description: Indicates whether or not there are specific criteria required for the email subject and "from" lines Affiliates must use in communications promoting the Offer.

fields.name: email_instructions_from
fields.description: Applicable when the "email_instructions" field is set to "1".  Indicates one or more acceptable "from" lines that can be used when promoting the Offer.  Valid lines are separated by line breaks.

fields.name: email_instructions_subject
fields.description: Applicable when the "email_instructions" field is set to "1".  Indicates one or more acceptable subject lines that can be used when promoting the Offer.  Valid lines are separated by line breaks.

fields.name: expiration_date
fields.description: Expiration date for the Offer.

fields.name: featured
fields.description: The date from which the Network has decided to make feature this Offer.  If NULL or set to "0000-00-00 00:00:00" this Offer is not currently featured.  Any other valid date is the begin date of the featured status.

fields.name: has_goals_enabled
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this Offer has Goals enabled.  NOTE: This field will only be present if the Network has Offer Goals enabled.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID for this Offer.

fields.name: is_expired
fields.description: Whether or not this Offer is expired (i.e. it has a past "expiration_date").

fields.name: is_pay_per_call
fields.description: Not present for all API calls.  Indicates whether or not this Offer supports pay-per-call conversions.

fields.name: monthly_conversion_cap
fields.description: Maximum number of conversions allowed per month for this Offer.  If value is set to "0" then there is no cap.  NOTE: Some Networks may choose to use this feature but this field is not present by default.

fields.name: monthly_payout_cap
fields.description: Maximum payout allowed per month for this Offer.  If value is set to "0.00" then there is no cap.  NOTE: Some Networks may choose to use this feature but this field is not present by default.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The Offer's name.

fields.name: payout_cap
fields.description: Maximum payout allowed per day for this Offer.  If value is set to "0.00" then there is no cap.  NOTE: Some Networks may choose to use this feature but this field not present by default.

fields.name: payout_type
fields.description: Specifies the method of calculating payout for this Offer.  "cpa_flat", "cpm", and "cpc" indicate a flat amount will be paid, specified in the "default_payout" field.  "cpa_percentage" indicates that a percentage of the sale will be paid, specified in the "percent_payout" field.  "cpa_both" indicates that both a flat rate and a percentage of the sale will be paid.

fields.name: percent_payout
fields.description: The percent of sale paid for this Offer.  For example, a value of "25.00" would indicate a 25% payout.  Applicable only for Offers whose "payout_type" includes a percent component, i.e. "cpa_percentage" and "cpa_both".

fields.name: preview_url
fields.description: URL that often skips any geo-targeting or other re-targeting implemented by the Offer URL.  Allows Affiliates to view sample landing page.

fields.name: require_approval
fields.description: Whether or not Affiliates must apply to run the Offer.

fields.name: require_terms_and_conditions
fields.description: Whether or not this Offer requires prior approval before an Affiliate can run it.  The text of the terms and conditions is in the "terms_and_conditions" field.

fields.name: show_custom_variables
fields.description: Whether or not custom variables can be used in tracking links. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/20718333-Adding-custom-variables-to-tracking-links.

fields.name: show_mail_list
fields.description: Indicates that a DNE List is attached to this Offer.  See the "dne_list_id" field for the ID of the list, and the "dne_download_url" and the related "dne_unsubscribe_url" fields.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the Offer.  Affiliates can only view active Offers.

fields.name: terms_and_conditions
fields.description: The terms and conditions Affiliates must agree to in order to run this Offer.  Should be present if "require_terms_and_conditions" is set to "enabled".

fields.name: use_target_rules
fields.description: Whether or not this Offer has Advanced Targeting enabled. For more information, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/hc/en-us/articles/202305356-Advanced-Targeting.

models.name: StaticApiKey
models.description: A static key assigned to an Affiliate User that does not expire, which can be used to make requests to the Affiliate API.  Static API Keys are only usable if the status is "active" and the Network has the "enable_affiliate_api" Preference enabled.

fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The unique, secret API key.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the API key.

models.name: TargetRuleOffer
models.description: This describes an association between an Advanced Targeting Rule and an Offer. It causes traffic to the referenced Offer to be restricted to requests which satisfy the Rule requirements. Rules apply to Offers that have Advanced Targeting enabled (their "use_target_rules" field is true). In order for a request to satisfy a Rule it must match the defined regular expression (when "action" is set to "allow") or not match the regular expression (when "action" is set to "deny"). For for information on Advanced Targeting, see: http://support.hasoffers.com/entries/25509947-Advanced-Targeting#logic.

fields.name: action
fields.description: Whether this rule is being enforced by requiring the request satisfy the condition ("allow") or by rejecting requests that satisfy the rule condition ("deny").

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID identifying this association between Rule and Offer.

fields.name: offer_id
fields.description: The ID of the Offer to which the Targeting Rule is being applied.

fields.name: rule
fields.description: The Advanced Targeting Rule model being associated with this Offer.

fields.name: rule_id
fields.description: The ID of the Advanced Targeting Rule being associated with this Offer.

models.name: TimeZone
models.description: Identifies a timezone and its relative offset from Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

fields.name: gmt
fields.description: Specifies the offset relative to GMT.  Formats possible are "(GMT-HH:MM)" for timezones behind GMT, "(GMT)" for timezones not different than GMT, and "(GMT+HH:MM)" for timezones ahead of GMT

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for this timezone.

fields.name: keyword
fields.description: A unique text identifier for this timezone, typically indicating region or country followed by a "/" and then a more specific sub-region or city, e.g. "America/Chicago", "Asia/Seoul". For more examples see http://www.php.net/manual/en/timezones.php.

fields.name: location
fields.description: A human-readable descriptor for the timezone, e.g. "Pacific Time", "Greenwich Mean Time".

models.name: UserPreferences
models.description: A setting specific to an Affiliate User that enables, disables, or modifies the behavior of the API or application.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique, auto-generated ID for this preference.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of this user preference.  Affiliates can only modify preferences with the following names: "disable_mail_room_email", "enforce_session_ip", "language", "timezone_id".

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The Affiliate User ID to whom this preference applies.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value being set for this preference.

parameters.description: Offer ID.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Tracking Link additional params.  If a "url" field is included, the URL value will be treated specially (if Website Links are enabled by the Network).  Additionally, a "url_id" field can be passed in if it should use a URL other than the Offer's default URL.  Any other fields will simply have the key/value pair attached to the resulting link as &key=value.

response.description: Associative array of Tracking Link information.

methods.name: requestOfferAccess
methods.shortDescription:
This function allows an Affiliate to request access to an Offer that
requires approval.
methods.longDescription:
It ensures that all required (global and offer-specific) questions were
answered.
After saving the answers it inserts a row into affiliates_offers with
a status of pending.

parameters.description: The offer to which the affiliate is applying

parameters.name: answers
parameters.description: An array of answers for offer signup questions to save for this affiliate's offer application

fields.name: question_id
fields.description: The ID of the SignupQuestion for which this answer corresponds.

fields.name: answer
fields.description: The user-provided answer to the question.

methods.name: getAllowedTypes
methods.shortDescription: Gets an array of the allowed pixel types for the given offer.
methods.longDescription:
If an offer is using iFrame tracking, all pixel types are allowed
If an offer is using image tracking, only image and postbacks are allowed
Else only postbacks are allowed

parameters.name: offer_id
parameters.description: The Offer ID for which the Offer Pixel will be added.

response.description: The allowed pixel types in {'code', 'image', 'url'}

methods.name: updateField
methods.shortDescription: Update Offer Pixel field with value by Offer Pixel ID.
methods.longDescription:
Only affiliates with the Offer Management permission can create/update Offer Pixels.
The only field that can be updated is "status" and the only allowed transition is to "deleted".
Changes to the "code" field require a new Offer Pixel be created, as it cannot be updated in place.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Offer Pixel ID.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Offer Pixel field to update.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to update field to.

response.description: Returns true on successful update.
